# Cortical Test Data

Test data for cortical atlas creation pipelines.

## Files

### Yeo7 Network Annotations
- `lh.yeo7.annot` - Left hemisphere Yeo 7 Networks annotation
- `rh.yeo7.annot` - Right hemisphere Yeo 7 Networks annotation

**Source:** FreeSurfer fsaverage5 subject (`$FREESURFER_HOME/subjects/fsaverage5/label/`)

**Citation:** Yeo BT, Krienen FM, Sepulcre J, Sabuncu MR, Lashkari D, Hollinshead M, 
Roffman JL, Smoller JW, ZÃ¶llei L, Polimeni JR, Fischl B, Liu H, Buckner RL. 
The organization of the human cerebral cortex estimated by intrinsic functional 
connectivity. J Neurophysiol. 2011 Sep;106(3):1125-65.

### Test Label Files
- `lh.region1.label` - Synthetic test label (left hemisphere)
- `lh.region2.label` - Synthetic test label (left hemisphere)
- `rh.region1.label` - Synthetic test label (right hemisphere)

**Source:** Generated for testing purposes (vertex indices from fsaverage5).
